src:
Ini Dia 5 Nomine Startup Pendatang Baru Terbaik Pilihan Tempo
02 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tempo Media Group menggelar penghargaan untuk perusahaan rintisan atau startup bertajuk “Start Up Pilihan Tempo 2019”. Acara ini merupakan hasil kolaborasi Tempo dengan Digitaraya, yang didukung oleh Gojek.
Sebanyak 15 startup dipilih menjadi nomine. Seluruhnya terbagi atas tiga kategori, yaitu Startup dengan Dampak Sosial Terbaik (Best Social Impact Startup), Startup Pendatang Baru Terbaik (Best Newcomer Startup), dan Startup Pilihan Pembaca (Peoples’s Choice Startup).
Dihimpun Tempo, berikut ini profil lima start up yang terpilih sebagai nomine Best Newcomer Startup.
1. Bobobox Bobobox merupakan jaringan hotel waralaba dengan konsep kamar kapsul berteknologi tinggi. Bobobox didirikan oleh lima pemuda dari Bandung, yakni Frans Risky, Hafidz Syahrial, Ahmad Qois, Agung Mahesa, dan Brian Andrianto. Hotel ini mulai dirilis pada 2018.
Saat ini, hotel kapsul termasuk penginapan yang mengusung konsep digital. Konsep ini dapat menekan pemberdayaan sumber daya manusia karena sistem operasinya dikendalikan komputer.
2. Kedaisayur Perusahaan rintisan ini melayani pemesanan hingga pengantaran berbagai macam sayuran hingga bebumbuan. Kedaisayur didirikan oleh Adrian Hernanto, mantan Deputy Director of Business Process dan IT. Aplikasi itu ia garap beserta kedua koleganya, Ahmad Supriyadi dan Rizki Novian.
Pada 2018, perusahaan ini memperoleh pendanaan sekitar us$ 1,3 juta. Investor pimpinan East Ventures lah yang mendanai Kedaisayur. Pendanaan ini kemudian dipakai untuk memgembangkan bisnis.
3. Logisly Perusahaan rintisan yang didirikan dengan naungan PT Logistik Pintar Indonesia ini memfokuskan bisnisnya di bidang e-forwarding B2B. Saat ini, perusahaan itu dipimpin oleh co-founder dan CEO Logisly Roolin Njotosetiadi.
12 Selanjutnya
text:
Here Are 5 Nominees, Startup Options, The Best New Arrivals for Tempo
02 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tempo Media Group is holding an award for startups or startups titled "Start Up Tempo 2019 Options". This event is the result of a collaboration between Tempo and Digitaraya, which is supported by Gojek.
A total of 15 startups were chosen to be nominees. All of them are divided into three categories, namely the Best Social Impact Startup, the Best Newcomer Startup, and the Peoples' Choice Startup.
Compiled by Tempo, here are the profiles of five start-ups chosen as the Best Newcomer Startup nominees.
1. Bobobox Bobobox is a franchise hotel chain with a high-tech capsule room concept. Bobobox was founded by five young men from Bandung, namely Frans Risky, Hafidz Syahrial, Ahmad Qois, Agung Mahesa, and Brian Andrianto. This hotel will be released in 2018.
Currently, capsule hotels are lodgings that carry the digital concept. This concept can suppress the empowerment of human resources because the operating system is computer controlled.
2. Kedaisayur This startup company serves orders to deliver a variety of vegetables to spices. Kedaisayur was founded by Adrian Hernanto, former Deputy Director of Business Process and IT. He worked on the application along with his two colleagues, Ahmad Supriyadi and Rizki Novian.
In 2018, the company will receive funding of around US $ 1.3 million. East Ventures-led investors are funding Kedaisayur. This funding is then used to develop the business.
3. Logical This startup, which was established under the auspices of PT Logistik Pintar Indonesia, focuses its business in the field of B2B e-forwarding. At present, the company is led by Logis-co-founder and CEO Roolin Njotosetiadi.
12 Next
